snippet.title: Death Hall Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Run for your life and escape the Death Hall in this diabolical platform-hell game. Avoid an evil, unrelenting monster along with all manner of nasty traps and critters. Will you make it to the end?

Available now on the App Store.

Visit the developer on twitter at https://twitter.com/ghostoftomby
Check out Gareth Wiecko's awesome music at http://www.garethwiecko.com
